revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 90:;Mesore 3 likewise:;Aphrodisios, son of Petheus, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Taseus, copper drachmas 8;;Maron, son of Satabous, grandson of Maron, mother Tkonnos, copper drachmas 4;;Petesouchos, son of Petheus, grandson of Petheus, mother Tkollainis, copper drachmas 4;;Petsiris, son of Pasion, grandson of Petsiris, mother Taonnophris, copper drachmas 4;;Phaesis, son of Pekmeis alias Heuremon, mother Sambathion, copper drachmas 4;;Sabeinos, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Horos, mother Tapetheus, copper drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Menches, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thases, copper obols 28;;Celer, son of Aphrodisios;;(in left margin: drachmas 4 obols 17) orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira drachmas 4 obols 3, tax on the produce of olives obols 2 chalki 2, naubion obol 1.5, surcharges obols 3.5 chalki 2;;eparourion drachma 1 obols 4, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 5 obols 4 chalki 2;;Ptolemaios, son of Naaraus, grandson of Horion, mother Taorsenouphis, copper drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Tauris, copper obols 28;;Theon, son of Theon, grandson of Petheus, mother Zoidous, drachmas 16;;Horion, son of Petheus, grandson of Esouris, mother Komonis, copper drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Ischyras, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaubastis, drachmas 40;;Kastor, son of Petheus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Herakleia, drachmas 4 obols 20, copper drachmas 4 obols 8;;Tepheros, daughter of Heras through the agency of Ptolemaios, son of Petermouthis (Herakl(), porter);;(in left margin: drachmas 16 obols 9) orchard taxes of the 12th year apomoira drachmas 2 obols 4, tax on the produce of olives obols 2.5, naubion obol 1.5 chalki 2, surcharges obols 4 chalki 2;;eparourion drachma 1 obols 4.5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 6 obol 1;;geometria of year 12 drachmas 9 obols 3.5, surcharges obols 3.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 10 obol 1 chalki 2;;Horos, son of Harpagathes, grandson of Horos, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4, copper drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 144 obols 28;;Mesore 4:;Ammonios alias Diodoros, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 40;;Kastor, fatherless, mother Tanomgeus, drachmas 32;;Orsenouphis, son of Petheus, grandson of Horion, mother Tapetheus, copper drachmas 8;;Petheus, son of Nestosiris, grandson of Petheus, mother Thermouthis, copper drachmas 4;;Leouas, son of Petheus, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Tapapeis, copper drachmas 4;;Horion, son of Sisouchos, grandson of Sisouchos, mother Apollonous, copper drachmas 8;;Phanomgeus, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Thaesis, copper drachmas 8;;Aunes, son of Aunes, grandson of Hermas, mother Tapetheus, copper drachmas 8;;Petaus, son of Sisois, grandson of Satabous, mother Thermouthis, copper drachmas 8;;Gaius Julius Apolinarius (Patis, priest);;(in left margin: drachmas 8 obols 22) orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira drachma 1 obol 1.5, tax on the produce of olives obol 1 chalki 2, naubion obol 0.5 chalki 2, surcharges obols 2;;eparourion drachma 1 obols 4, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 3 obols 5 chalki 2;;geometria of year 12 drachmas 3 obol 0.5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 3 obols 2;;naubion of katoikoi of year 13 obol 1, surcharges chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total obol 1 chalki 2;;on land plots in release likewise drachma 1 obol 0.5, surcharges obols 2.5, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachmas 2 obol 1 chalki 2."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 -- CPJ 3, 492 (lines with Sambathion); BL III, 113 (on l. 8 a.o) Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
